alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central St. Johns and southern Duval Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 453 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bayard to 6 miles south of World Golf Village. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, Durbin, Bayard and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval
